settings.title: SPECIAL OFFERS WITH RUSTIC KITCHEN AND BATH

settings.code:
Are You a Member of the Military, Veteran, or First Responder?

At Rustic Kitchen and Bath, we want to honor those who have risked their lives to serve our country. Your commitment to our freedom and safety deserves thanks and appreciation. Let a member of our team assist you with your order to get you the best deal possible.

Who Qualifies?

  • Current members of the Air Force, Army, Coast Guard, Marine Corps, Navy, or Space Force
  • Veterans of the Air Force, Army, Coast Guard, Marine Corps, Navy, or Space Force
  • Current or past firefighters, law enforcement, medical personnel, or other similar first responders.

How Do I Apply?

  • All you have to do is provide proof of service or employment to sales@rustickitchenandbath.com

 

Contact:

Phone: (866) 212-9706, Ext. 1

Email: sales@rustickitchenandbath.com
